member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Mapping service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.CreateChannelAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.CreateChannelRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create a new map channel and become its authority
member.remarks:
Creates a new region+kind channel and grants authority to caller.
Returns ingestTopic for high-throughput event publishing.
If channel already exists with active authority, returns Conflict.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.ReleaseAuthorityAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.ReleaseAuthorityRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Release authority over a channel
member.remarks:
Voluntarily releases authority. Channel becomes unassigned.
Only the current authority can release.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.AuthorityHeartbeatAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AuthorityHeartbeatRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Maintain authority over channel
member.remarks:
Keep-alive for authority. Must be called periodically (default every 30s).
Failure to heartbeat results in authority expiration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.PublishMapUpdateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.PublishMapUpdateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Publish map data update (RPC path)
member.remarks:
Game servers use this to push authoritative spatial updates.
Validates authority token, stores update, and broadcasts to consumers.
For high-throughput scenarios, use event publishing via ingestTopic instead.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.PublishObjectChangesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.PublishObjectChangesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Publish metadata object changes (batch)
member.remarks:
Game servers use this to push object state changes.
Efficiently batches multiple object changes into one event.
Max 100 changes per request.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.RequestSnapshotAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.RequestSnapshotRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request full snapshot for cold start
member.remarks:
Consumers use this when starting up to get initial state.
Returns current snapshot of requested region/kinds.
For very large maps, payloadRef points to lib-asset storage.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.QueryPointAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.QueryPointRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Query map data at a specific point
member.remarks:
Returns all map data at a point across requested kinds.
Used by behavior stacks for contextual decisions.
Optionally includes objects within radius.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.QueryBoundsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.QueryBoundsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Query map data within bounds
member.remarks:
Returns map data within a bounding box.
For event actors needing region overview.
Limited to maxObjects per kind.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.QueryObjectsByTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.QueryObjectsByTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Find all objects of a type in region
member.remarks:
Returns all objects matching an objectType filter.
For event actors asking "where are all the boulder clusters?"

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.QueryAffordanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AffordanceQueryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Find locations that afford a specific action or scene type
member.remarks:
Affordance queries answer "where can I do X?" by combining
multiple map kinds and applying game-specific scoring logic.
Used by Event Brain for procedural scene orchestration:
- "Find ambush locations"
- "Find dramatic reveal spots"
- "Find sheltered rest areas"
Well-known types have predefined scoring; use affordanceType=custom
with customAffordance for novel scenarios.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.CheckoutForAuthoringAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AuthoringCheckoutRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Acquire exclusive edit lock for design-time editing
member.remarks:
For level editors and design tools only.
Game servers do NOT use this - they use create-channel for implicit authority.
Returns authority token for publishing edits.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.CommitAuthoringAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AuthoringCommitRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Commit design-time changes
member.remarks:
Commits pending changes and releases the checkout lock.
Optionally includes a commit message for history.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.ReleaseAuthoringAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AuthoringReleaseRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Release authoring checkout without committing
member.remarks:
Discards pending changes and releases the checkout lock.
Use when abandoning edits.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.CreateDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.CreateDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create a map definition template
member.remarks:
Creates a new map definition (template) that describes the structure
of a region. Definitions are templates that can be used to bootstrap
channels with predefined layer configurations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.GetDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.GetDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get a map definition by ID
member.remarks: Returns the full map definition including all layer configurations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.ListDefinitionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.ListDefinitionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List map definitions with optional filters
member.remarks: Returns a paginated list of map definitions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.UpdateDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.UpdateDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update a map definition
member.remarks:
Updates an existing map definition. Cannot change the definition ID.
Layer configurations can be modified.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.DeleteDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.DeleteDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete a map definition
member.remarks: Deletes a map definition. Cannot delete if active channels reference it.

member.summary:
The category of spatial data this map contains.
Different kinds have different update frequencies, storage models, and TTLs.

member.summary: How to handle publish attempts from non-authority sources

member.summary:

already has expired authority. Controls what happens to existing data.

member.summary:
Well-known affordance types with predefined scoring logic.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.MapPayload

Schema-less payload. Only envelope fields are validated.
The 'data' field can contain ANYTHING the publisher wants.
lib-mapping does not validate contents - only publisher and consumer care.

reset: Clear all channel data before new authority takes over.
require_consume: New authority must call RequestSnapshot before publishing.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Mesh service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.GetEndpointsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.GetEndpointsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get endpoints for a service
member.remarks:
Returns all healthy endpoints for the specified app-id.
Used by IMeshClient to resolve target hosts for service invocation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.ListEndpointsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.ListEndpointsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List all registered endpoints
member.remarks:
Returns all registered service endpoints across all app-ids.
Admin-only endpoint for monitoring and debugging.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.RegisterEndpointAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.RegisterEndpointRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Register a service endpoint
member.remarks:
Registers this instance's endpoint in the service mesh.
Called during service startup to announce availability.
Endpoint TTL is refreshed on each heartbeat.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.DeregisterEndpointAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.DeregisterEndpointRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deregister a service endpoint
member.remarks:
Removes this instance's endpoint from the service mesh.
Called during graceful shutdown.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.HeartbeatAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.HeartbeatRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update endpoint health and load
member.remarks:
Refreshes endpoint TTL and updates health/load metrics.
Should be called periodically (default: every 30 seconds).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.GetRouteAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.GetRouteRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get optimal endpoint for routing
member.remarks:
Returns a single endpoint for the specified app-id, selected by the
configured load balancing algorithm (round-robin, least-connections, weighted).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.GetMappingsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.GetMappingsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get service-to-app-id mappings
member.remarks:
Returns the current service name to app-id mapping table.
Used by ServiceAppMappingResolver for distributed deployment.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.IMeshClient.GetHealthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mesh.GetHealthRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get mesh health status
member.remarks:
Returns overall health of the service mesh including:
- Total registered endpoints
- Healthy/degraded/unavailable counts
- Redis connectivity status

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Orchestrator service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetInfrastructureHealthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.InfrastructureHealthRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check infrastructure component health
member.remarks:
Validates connectivity and health of core infrastructure components:
- Redis (direct connection via StackExchange.Redis)
- RabbitMQ (direct connection via RabbitMQ.Client)
-
member.returns: Infrastructure health status (check response body for component health)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetServicesHealthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ServiceHealthRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get health status of all services
member.remarks:
Retrieves health information from all services via Redis heartbeat monitoring.
Uses existing ServiceHeartbeatEvent schema from common-events.yaml.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.RestartServiceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ServiceRestartRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restart service with optional configuration
member.remarks:
Performs intelligent service restart based on health metrics.
Only restarts if truly necessary (e.g., 5+ minute degradation).
Supports optional environment variable updates during restart.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.ShouldRestartServiceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ShouldRestartServiceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if service needs restart
member.remarks:
Evaluates service health and determines if restart is necessary.
Restart logic:
- Healthy: No restart needed
- Degraded < 5 min: No restart needed
- Degraded > 5 min: Restart recommended
- Unavailable: Restart needed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetBackendsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ListBackendsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Detect available container orchestration backends
member.remarks:
Detects which container orchestration backends are available on this system.
Returns availability status and capabilities for each backend.
**Priority Order** (for automatic selection):
1. Kubernetes - Full cluster orchestration with operators
2. Portainer - API abstraction over Compose/Swarm with web UI
3. Docker Swarm - Native Docker cluster orchestration
4. Docker Compose - Single-host container management
Detection methods:
- Kubernetes: Check for kubectl and cluster connectivity
- Portainer: Check for Portainer API endpoint
- Swarm: Check `docker info` for swarm mode
- Compose: Check for docker compose v2 availability

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetPresetsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ListPresetsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List available deployment presets
member.remarks:
Returns all available deployment presets from the orchestrator's preset directory.
Presets define service combinations and configuration for specific use cases.
Built-in presets:
- `local-development`: All services in single container with mesh infrastructure
- `local-testing`: Test environment with infrastructure services
- `integration-http`: HTTP integration testing preset
- `integration-edge`: WebSocket/edge testing preset
- `split-auth-account`: Auth and Account in separate containers
- `distributed-npc`: NPC processing distributed across nodes

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.DeployAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.DeployRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deploy or update an environment
member.remarks:
Deploys a complete environment using a preset or custom configuration.
Supports graceful transitions, forced deployments, and clean rebuilds.
**Deployment Modes**:
- `graceful`: Wait for existing connections to drain before changing topology
- `force`: Immediately apply changes (may interrupt active connections)
- `clean`: Tear down completely and rebuild from scratch
**Backend Selection**:
- If `backend` not specified, uses highest-priority available backend
- If `backend` specified but unavailable, returns error (no fallback)
**Live Topology Changes**:
Supports changing service distribution without full restart:
- Move auth/account to separate container while keeping other services together
- Scale specific services to additional nodes
- Update environment variables without restart (where supported)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetServiceRoutingAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetServiceRoutingRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current service-to-app-id routing mappings
member.remarks:
Returns the current service-to-app-id routing mappings used for mesh service invocation through lib-mesh.
This is the authoritative source of truth for how services are routed in the current deployment.
In development, all services route to "bannou" by default. In production, services may be
distributed across multiple app-ids based on deployment topology.
**Use Cases**:
- Services querying routing on startup
- Debugging service communication issues
- Monitoring deployment topology

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current environment status
member.remarks:
Returns comprehensive status of the current deployment including:
- Active backend and deployment configuration
- Service topology (which services on which containers)
- Container health and resource usage
- Infrastructure component status
- Active preset and any customizations

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.TeardownAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Tear down the current environment
member.remarks:
Tears down all containers and services in the current deployment.
Optionally preserves volumes and networks for faster redeployment.
**Teardown Modes**:
- `graceful`: Signal shutdown and wait for clean exit
- `force`: Immediately stop all containers (SIGKILL)
- `preserve-data`: Keep volumes and networks, only remove containers

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.CleanAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.CleanRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Clean up unused resources
member.remarks:
Prunes unused Docker resources to reclaim disk space and clean up
orphaned containers, networks, volumes, and images.
Equivalent to running various `docker system prune` commands.
**Clean Targets**:
- `containers`: Remove stopped containers
- `networks`: Remove unused networks
- `volumes`: Remove unused volumes (CAUTION: data loss)
- `images`: Remove dangling images
- `all`: All of the above

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetLogsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetLogsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get service/container logs
member.remarks:
Retrieves logs from services or containers with filtering options.
Supports real-time streaming via WebSocket upgrade.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.UpdateTopologyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TopologyUpdateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update service topology without full redeploy
member.remarks:
Changes which services run on which containers without tearing down
the entire environment. Enables live topology changes.
**Use Cases**:
- Move auth service to dedicated container for scaling
- Consolidate services during low-traffic periods
- Split services for debugging/isolation
- Add new service nodes to running environment

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.RequestContainerRestartAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ContainerRestartRequestBody,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request container restart (self-service pattern)
member.remarks:
Plugins call this endpoint to request restart of their own container.
This is part of the self-service configuration update pattern where
plugins decide if they care about config changes and request restarts.
**Flow**:
1. Orchestrator publishes ConfigurationChangedEvent with changed keys
2. Plugins check if any changed keys match their dependencies
3. Plugins that care call this endpoint to request restart
4. Orchestrator performs rolling restart of requested containers
**Priority Levels**:
- `graceful`: Rolling update, wait for healthy before cycling next instance
- `immediate`: Rolling update but don't wait for connection drain
- `force`: Kill all instances simultaneously (causes downtime)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetContainerStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetContainerStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get container health and restart history
member.remarks:
Returns detailed status of a container including health, restart history,
running plugins, and current configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.RollbackConfigurationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigRollbackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Rollback to previous configuration
member.remarks:
Quickly rollback to the previous configuration without waiting for CI.
Swaps currentConfig with previousConfig and publishes ConfigurationChangedEvent
with the reverted keys so services can request restart.
**Note**: This is a quick fix. GitHub secrets should still be corrected
to prevent re-breaking on next orchestrator deploy.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetConfigVersionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetConfigVersionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current configuration version and metadata
member.remarks:
Returns the current configuration version, last update time,
and summary of configuration state (not actual values for security).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.AcquireProcessorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.AcquireProcessorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Acquire a processor from a pool
member.remarks:
Requests an available processor instance from the specified pool type.
Returns the app-id of an available processor or 429 if none available.
The processor is marked as busy until explicitly released.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.ReleaseProcessorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ReleaseProcessorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Release a processor back to the pool
member.remarks:
Releases a previously acquired processor, making it available for other requests.
Should be called when processing is complete or on error cleanup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetPoolStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetPoolStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get processing pool status
member.remarks:
Returns current status of a processing pool including:
- Total instances (running and available)
- Current utilization
- Queue depth (waiting requests)
- Recent processing metrics

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.ScalePoolAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ScalePoolRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Scale a processing pool
member.remarks:
Manually adjust the size of a processing pool.
Can scale up (add instances) or scale down (remove idle instances).
Respects min/max constraints from pool configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.CleanupPoolAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.CleanupPoolRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Cleanup idle processing pool instances
member.remarks:
Scales pool back to minimum instances by removing idle processors.
Used for resource reclamation during low-activity periods.

member.returns: Infrastructure health status (check response body for component health)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetServicesHealthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ServiceHealthRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.RestartServiceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ServiceRestartRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restart service with optional configuration
member.remarks:
Performs intelligent service restart based on health metrics.
Only restarts if truly necessary (e.g., 5+ minute degradation).
Supports optional environment variable updates during restart.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.ShouldRestartServiceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ShouldRestartServiceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if service needs restart
member.remarks:
Evaluates service health and determines if restart is necessary.
Restart logic:
- Healthy: No restart needed
- Degraded < 5 min: No restart needed
- Degraded > 5 min: Restart recommended
- Unavailable: Restart needed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetBackendsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ListBackendsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Detect available container orchestration backends
member.remarks:
Detects which container orchestration backends are available on this system.
Returns availability status and capabilities for each backend.
**Priority Order** (for automatic selection):
1. Kubernetes - Full cluster orchestration with operators
2. Portainer - API abstraction over Compose/Swarm with web UI
3. Docker Swarm - Native Docker cluster orchestration
4. Docker Compose - Single-host container management
Detection methods:
- Kubernetes: Check for kubectl and cluster connectivity
- Portainer: Check for Portainer API endpoint
- Swarm: Check `docker info` for swarm mode
- Compose: Check for docker compose v2 availability

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetPresetsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ListPresetsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List available deployment presets
member.remarks:
Returns all available deployment presets from the orchestrator's preset directory.
Presets define service combinations and configuration for specific use cases.
Built-in presets:
- `local-development`: All services in single container with mesh infrastructure
- `local-testing`: Test environment with infrastructure services
- `integration-http`: HTTP integration testing preset
- `integration-edge`: WebSocket/edge testing preset
- `split-auth-account`: Auth and Account in separate containers
- `distributed-npc`: NPC processing distributed across nodes

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.DeployAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.DeployRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deploy or update an environment
member.remarks:
Deploys a complete environment using a preset or custom configuration.
Supports graceful transitions, forced deployments, and clean rebuilds.
**Deployment Modes**:
- `graceful`: Wait for existing connections to drain before changing topology
- `force`: Immediately apply changes (may interrupt active connections)
- `clean`: Tear down completely and rebuild from scratch
**Backend Selection**:
- If `backend` not specified, uses highest-priority available backend
- If `backend` specified but unavailable, returns error (no fallback)
**Live Topology Changes**:
Supports changing service distribution without full restart:
- Move auth/account to separate container while keeping other services together
- Scale specific services to additional nodes
- Update environment variables without restart (where supported)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetServiceRoutingAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetServiceRoutingRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current service-to-app-id routing mappings
member.remarks:
Returns the current service-to-app-id routing mappings used for mesh service invocation through lib-mesh.
This is the authoritative source of truth for how services are routed in the current deployment.
In development, all services route to "bannou" by default. In production, services may be
distributed across multiple app-ids based on deployment topology.
**Use Cases**:
- Services querying routing on startup
- Debugging service communication issues
- Monitoring deployment topology

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current environment status
member.remarks:
Returns comprehensive status of the current deployment including:
- Active backend and deployment configuration
- Service topology (which services on which containers)
- Container health and resource usage
- Infrastructure component status
- Active preset and any customizations

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.TeardownAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Tear down the current environment
member.remarks:
Tears down all containers and services in the current deployment.
Optionally preserves volumes and networks for faster redeployment.
**Teardown Modes**:
- `graceful`: Signal shutdown and wait for clean exit
- `force`: Immediately stop all containers (SIGKILL)
- `preserve-data`: Keep volumes and networks, only remove containers

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.CleanAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.CleanRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Clean up unused resources
member.remarks:
Prunes unused Docker resources to reclaim disk space and clean up
orphaned containers, networks, volumes, and images.
Equivalent to running various `docker system prune` commands.
**Clean Targets**:
- `containers`: Remove stopped containers
- `networks`: Remove unused networks
- `volumes`: Remove unused volumes (CAUTION: data loss)
- `images`: Remove dangling images
- `all`: All of the above

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetLogsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetLogsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get service/container logs
member.remarks:
Retrieves logs from services or containers with filtering options.
Supports real-time streaming via WebSocket upgrade.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.UpdateTopologyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TopologyUpdateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update service topology without full redeploy
member.remarks:
Changes which services run on which containers without tearing down
the entire environment. Enables live topology changes.
**Use Cases**:
- Move auth service to dedicated container for scaling
- Consolidate services during low-traffic periods
- Split services for debugging/isolation
- Add new service nodes to running environment

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.RequestContainerRestartAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ContainerRestartRequestBody,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request container restart (self-service pattern)
member.remarks:
Plugins call this endpoint to request restart of their own container.
This is part of the self-service configuration update pattern where
plugins decide if they care about config changes and request restarts.
**Flow**:
1. Orchestrator publishes ConfigurationChangedEvent with changed keys
2. Plugins check if any changed keys match their dependencies
3. Plugins that care call this endpoint to request restart
4. Orchestrator performs rolling restart of requested containers
**Priority Levels**:
- `graceful`: Rolling update, wait for healthy before cycling next instance
- `immediate`: Rolling update but don't wait for connection drain
- `force`: Kill all instances simultaneously (causes downtime)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.GetContainerStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetContainerStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get container health and restart history
member.remarks:
Returns detailed status of a container including health, restart history,
running plugins, and current configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.RollbackConfigurationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigRollbackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Rollback to previous configuration
member.remarks:
Quickly rollback to the previous configuration without waiting for CI.
Swaps currentConfig with previousConfig and publishes ConfigurationChangedEvent
with the reverted keys so services can request restart.
**Note**: This is a quick fix. GitHub secrets should still be corrected
to prevent re-breaking on next orchestrator deploy.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.OrchestratorClient.ReleaseProcessorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ReleaseProcessorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Release a processor back to the pool
member.remarks:
Releases a previously acquired processor, making it available for other requests.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownMode
member.summary:
Teardown mode:
- graceful: Signal shutdown, wait for clean exit
- force: Immediately stop (SIGKILL)
- preserve-data: Keep volumes/networks, remove containers

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest
member.summary: Request to tear down a deployed environment with options for data preservation

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.DryRun
member.summary:
When true, simulates teardown without actually stopping or removing containers.
Returns what would be torn down. ALWAYS use dryRun=true first to preview the impact.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.Mode
member.summary: How the teardown should be performed

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.Timeout
member.summary: Graceful shutdown timeout in seconds

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.RemoveVolumes
member.summary: Also remove associated volumes

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.RemoveNetworks
member.summary: Also remove associated networks

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.IncludeInfrastructure
member.summary:
When true, also removes support infrastructure (Redis, RabbitMQ, MySQL, etc.).
This is determined by scanning compose files or finding containers in the same
Docker swarm/Kubernetes namespace as bannou services. USE WITH EXTREME CAUTION -
this will destroy all data and require a full re-deployment.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent
member.summary:
Published by orchestrator when configuration or secrets change.
All containers receive this event via RabbitMQ. Plugins decide if they care
based on the changedKeys prefixes and request restart if needed.
Topic: bannou-configuration-events

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent.EventId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this event instance

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent.Timestamp
member.summary: When this configuration change occurred

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent.ConfigVersion
member.summary: Monotonically increasing version number

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent.ChangedKeys
member.summary:
Configuration keys that changed (not values for security).
Key prefixes indicate scope:
- "auth.*" - Authentication-related
- "database.*" - Database connections
- "mesh.*" - Mesh components (typically global impact)
- "connect.*" - WebSocket/connection settings

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.RestartPriority
member.summary:
Restart urgency level:
- graceful: Rolling update, wait for healthy before cycling next instance
- immediate: Rolling update but don't wait for connection drain
- force: Kill all instances simultaneously (causes downtime)

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get available API methods for session
member.remarks: Returns compiled list of methods available to this session

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Validate specific API access for session

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Register or update service permission matrix
member.remarks: Updates Redis with ServiceID -> State -> Role -> Methods structure

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Permission.IPermissionClient.UpdateSessionRoleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Permission.SessionRoleUpdate,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

member.remarks: Updates SessionID -> Role and recompiles all service permissions
member.returns: Session role updated and all permissions recompiled

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Permission.IPermissionClient.ClearSessionStateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Permission.ClearSessionStateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Clear session state for specific service
member.remarks:
Removes state for a specific service from the session and recompiles permissions.
If states list is provided, only clears if current state matches one of the values.
If states list is empty or not provided, clears the state unconditionally.
member.returns: Session state cleared and permissions recompiled

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Permission.IPermissionClient.GetSessionInfoAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Permission.SessionInfoRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get complete session information
member.remarks: Returns current states, role, and compiled permissions

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Permission.IPermissionClient.GetRegisteredServicesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Permission.ListServicesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List all registered services
member.remarks:
Returns list of all services that have registered their permissions.
This endpoint is used by testers to wait for service readiness - a service
appearing in this list means it has completed startup and registered its
API permissions, indicating it's ready to handle requests.
For service-to-service calls (via mesh), this endpoint is unrestricted.
For client calls through WebSocket/Connect, only admin users can access it.

appearing in this list means it has completed startup and registered its
API permissions, indicating it's ready to handle requests.
For service-to-service calls (via mesh), this endpoint is unrestricted.
For client calls through WebSocket/Connect, only admin users can access it.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.IRealmClient.DeleteRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.DeleteRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete realm
member.remarks:
Hard delete a realm. This will fail if the realm is still in use.
For safe removal, first deprecate the realm, then delete after all
references are removed. Only deprecated realms with zero references
can be deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.IRealmClient.DeprecateRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.DeprecateRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deprecate a realm
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a realm by marking it as deprecated.
Deprecated realms:
- Remain queryable for historical data
- Cannot be used for creating new entities (characters, locations, etc.)
- Can be hard-deleted after all references are removed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.IRealmClient.UndeprecateRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.UndeprecateRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restore a deprecated realm
member.remarks:
Remove the deprecated status from a realm, making it
available for new entities again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.IRealmClient.RealmExistsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.RealmExistsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if realm exists and is active
member.remarks:
Fast validation endpoint for other services to check realm validity.
Returns true if realm exists and is not deprecated, false otherwise.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.IRealmClient.SeedRealmsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Realm.SeedRealmsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Seed realms from configuration
member.remarks:
Idempotent operation to seed realms from provided data.
Creates realms that don't exist, optionally updates existing realms.
Typically called at service startup with YAML-defined realms.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.IRelationshipClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Relationship service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.IRelationshipClient.CreateRelationshipAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.CreateRelationshipRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create a new relationship between two entities
member.remarks:
Creates a relationship between two entities.
Duplicate relationships (same entities + same type) are prevented.
Relationships can be re-created after being ended.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.IRelationshipClient.GetRelationshipAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.GetRelationshipRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get a relationship by ID

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.IRelationshipClient.ListRelationshipsByEntityAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.ListRelationshipsByEntityRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List all relationships for an entity
member.remarks:
Returns all relationships where the specified entity is either
entity1 or entity2. Supports filtering by relationship type,
other entity type, and whether to include ended relationships.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.IRelationshipClient.GetRelationshipsBetweenAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.GetRelationshipsBetweenRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all relationships between two specific entities
member.remarks:
Returns all relationships that exist between two specific entities,
regardless of which is entity1 or entity2.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.IRelationshipClient.ListRelationshipsByTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.ListRelationshipsByTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List all relationships of a specific type
member.remarks:
Returns all relationships that use a specific relationship type.
Useful for finding all "FRIEND" relationships, for example.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.IRelationshipClient.UpdateRelationshipAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.UpdateRelationshipRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update relationship metadata
member.remarks: Only metadata can be updated. Entity IDs and types cannot be changed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.IRelationshipClient.EndRelationshipAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.EndRelationshipRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: End a relationship
member.remarks:
Marks a relationship as ended with a timestamp.
Ended relationships are preserved for history and can be re-created.
The composite uniqueness key is cleared, allowing new relationships
between the same entities with the same type.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.EntityType
member.summary:
Type of entity in a relationship.
- CHARACTER: Player-controlled characters
- NPC: Non-player characters
- MONSTER: Hostile or neutral creatures
- ITEM: Physical objects, artifacts, etc.
- LOCATION: Places, regions, buildings
- ORGANIZATION: Guilds, companies, groups
- FACTION: Political or social factions
- REALM: Game realms/worlds
- OTHER: Catch-all for future entity types

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.MatchesHierarchyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.MatchesHierarchyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if type matches ancestor in hierarchy
member.remarks:
Checks if a relationship type matches or descends from an ancestor type.
For example, "SON" matches "CHILD" because CHILD is an ancestor of SON.
This enables queries like "find all CHILD relationships" to match SON, DAUGHTER, etc.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.GetAncestorsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.GetAncestorsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all ancestors of a relationship type
member.remarks:
Returns the full ancestry chain from the specified type up to the root.
For example, for "SON" might return ["CHILD", "FAMILY"].

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.DeleteRelationshipTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.DeleteRelationshipTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete relationship type
member.remarks:
Hard delete a relationship type. This will fail if the type is still in use.
For safe removal, first deprecate the type, then merge it into another type
(or VOID), then delete. Only deprecated types with zero references can be deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.DeprecateRelationshipTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.DeprecateRelationshipTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deprecate a relationship type
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a relationship type by marking it as deprecated.
Deprecated types:
- Remain queryable for historical data
- Cannot be used for creating new relationships
- Can be merged into other types using the merge endpoint
- Can be hard-deleted after all references are removed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.UndeprecateRelationshipTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.UndeprecateRelationshipTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restore a deprecated relationship type
member.remarks:
Remove the deprecated status from a relationship type, making it
available for new relationships again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.MergeRelationshipTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.MergeRelationshipTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Merge a deprecated type into another type
member.remarks:
Migrate all relationships using a deprecated type to a target type.
This is the recommended way to handle type removal:
1. Deprecate the source type
2. Merge into the target type (or VOID for effective deletion)
3. Optionally hard-delete the now-empty deprecated type
The merge operation:
- Updates all relationships using sourceTypeId to use targetTypeId
- Publishes events for each affected relationship
- Returns count of migrated relationships
- Fails if source is not deprecated (safety check)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.IRelationshipTypeClient.SeedRelationshipTypesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.SeedRelationshipTypesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Seed relationship types from configuration
member.remarks:
Idempotent operation to seed relationship types from provided data.
Creates types that don't exist, optionally updates existing types.
Typically called at service startup with YAML-defined types.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.RelationshipTypeClient.MatchesHierarchyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.MatchesHierarchyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if type matches ancestor in hierarchy
member.remarks:
Checks if a relationship type matches or descends from an ancestor type.
For example, "SON" matches "CHILD" because CHILD is an ancestor of SON.
This enables queries like "find all CHILD relationships" to match SON, DAUGHTER, etc.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.RelationshipTypeClient.GetAncestorsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.RelationshipType.GetAncestorsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all ancestors of a relationship type
member.remarks:
Returns the full ancestry chain from the specified type up to the root.
For example, for "SON" might return ["CHILD", "FAMILY"].

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.ISpeciesClient.DeleteSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.DeleteSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete species
member.remarks:
Hard delete a species. This will fail if the species is still in use.
For safe removal, first deprecate the species, then merge it into another species
(or VOID), then delete. Only deprecated species with zero references can be deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.ISpeciesClient.DeprecateSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.DeprecateSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deprecate a species
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a species by marking it as deprecated.
Deprecated species:
- Remain queryable for historical data
- Cannot be used for creating new characters
- Can be merged into other species using the merge endpoint
- Can be hard-deleted after all references are removed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.ISpeciesClient.UndeprecateSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.UndeprecateSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restore a deprecated species
member.remarks:
Remove the deprecated status from a species, making it
available for new characters again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.ISpeciesClient.MergeSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.MergeSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Merge a deprecated species into another species
member.remarks:
Migrate all characters using a deprecated species to a target species.
This is the recommended way to handle species removal:
1. Deprecate the source species
2. Merge into the target species (or VOID for effective deletion)
3. Optionally hard-delete the now-empty deprecated species
The merge operation:
- Updates all characters using sourceSpeciesId to use targetSpeciesId
- Publishes events for each affected character
- Returns count of migrated characters
- Fails if source is not deprecated (safety check)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.ISpeciesClient.AddSpeciesToRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.AddSpeciesToRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Add species to a realm
member.remarks: Make a species available in an additional realm

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.ISpeciesClient.RemoveSpeciesFromRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.RemoveSpeciesFromRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Remove species from a realm
member.remarks: Remove a species from a realm (species must not have characters in that realm)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.ISpeciesClient.SeedSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.SeedSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Seed species from configuration
member.remarks:
Idempotent operation to seed species from provided data.
Creates species that don't exist, optionally updates existing species.
Typically called at service startup with YAML-defined species.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Subscription.ISubscriptionClient.GetAccountSubscriptionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Subscription.GetAccountSubscriptionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get subscriptions for an account
member.remarks: Returns all subscriptions for a given account, with optional filtering.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Subscription.ISubscriptionClient.QueryCurrentSubscriptionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Subscription.QueryCurrentSubscriptionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Query current (active, non-expired) subscriptions
member.remarks:
Returns active, non-expired subscriptions. Can query by:
- accountId: Get subscriptions for a specific account
- stubName: Get all accounts subscribed to a specific service
- Both: Check if a specific account is subscribed to a specific service
At least one of accountId or stubName must be provided.
Used by Auth service during session creation and GameSession service for subscriber discovery.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Subscription.QueryCurrentSubscriptionsRequest
member.summary:
Request to query current active subscriptions.
Provide accountId to get subscriptions for a specific account,
or stubName to get all accounts subscribed to a specific service,
or both to check if a specific account is subscribed to a specific service.
At least one of accountId or stubName must be provided.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Voice service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.CreateVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.CreateVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create voice room for a game session
member.remarks:
Creates a new voice room associated with a game session.
Called by GameSession service when creating a session with voice enabled.
Returns room ID and initial configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.GetVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.GetVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get voice room details
member.remarks:
Retrieves current state of a voice room including participant list.
Called by GameSession service to check room status.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.JoinVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.JoinVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Join voice room and register SIP endpoint
member.remarks:
Registers a participant's SIP endpoint with the voice room.
Called by GameSession service when a player joins a session.
Returns connection info and current peer list for P2P mode,
or RTP server details for scaled mode.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.LeaveVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.LeaveVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Leave voice room
member.remarks:
Removes a participant from the voice room and notifies other peers.
Called by GameSession service when a player leaves a session.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.DeleteVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.DeleteVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete voice room
member.remarks:
Deletes a voice room and notifies all participants.
Called by GameSession service when a session is deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.PeerHeartbeatAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.PeerHeartbeatRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update peer endpoint TTL
member.remarks:
Refreshes the TTL for a participant's endpoint registration.
Should be called periodically to prevent endpoint expiration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.AnswerPeerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.AnswerPeerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Send SDP answer to complete WebRTC handshake
member.remarks:
Called by clients after receiving a VoicePeerJoinedEvent containing an SDP offer.
The client generates an SDP answer and sends it via this endpoint.
The answering peer is notified via VoicePeerUpdatedEvent.
**Access Control**: This endpoint requires the `voice:ringing` state, which is
automatically set by the Voice service when a VoicePeerJoinedEvent is sent to the client.
The state is cleared after the answer is processed or times out.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase
member.summary: Abstract base class for behavior evaluators providing common merge logic. Game extends this with entity system specifics.

remarks.para: This base class handles: - Model cache management - Intent merging for all 4 model types - Output buffer allocation
Game-specific implementation provides: - Which models are active per character - How to get character-specific variant preferences - How to populate the shared input state

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase.ModelCache
member.summary: The model cache for interpreter lookup.

member.summary: The intent merger for combining outputs.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase._outputBuffer
member.summary: Pre-allocated output buffer to avoid per-frame allocation. Size is 15 slots: 5 channels * 2 slots + 5 extra slots for targets/positions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase.#ctor(BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorModelCache)
member.summary: Creates a new behavior evaluator with the specified cache.

member.summary: Evaluates a single model type for a character.
member.param: The behavior model type to evaluate.
Current game state as input values.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase.IsModelActive(System.Guid,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType)
member.summary: Determines if a behavior model type is active for a character.
member.param: The behavior model type to check.
member.returns: True if the model should be evaluated, false to skip.

remarks.para: Override this to implement game-specific activation logic. For example: - Combat model only active when in combat - Interaction model only active near interactable objects - Idle model always active but with low urgency
Default implementation returns true for all model types.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase.GetPreferredVariant(System.Guid,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType)
member.summary: Gets the preferred variant for a character/type combination.
member.returns: Variant name, or null for default.

remarks.para: Override this to implement game-specific variant selection. For example: - Combat variant based on equipped weapon type - Movement variant based on mount state - Interaction variant based on character class
Default implementation returns null (uses default variant).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.BehaviorModelCache
member.summary: Caches behavior model interpreters per (character, type, variant) combination. Supports fallback chains for variant selection.

remarks.para: Models are registered by type and variant name (e.g., "sword-and-shield" combat). When requesting an interpreter, the cache checks the fallback chain to find the best available variant.
Example fallback chain for combat: ["sword-and-shield", "one-handed", "default"] If character requests "sword-and-shield" and it's not registered, falls back to "one-handed", then "default".
Thread-safety: The cache uses ConcurrentDictionary for thread-safe access. Individual interpreter instances are NOT thread-safe - each character should have its own interpreter.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.IBehaviorEvaluator
member.summary: Interface for evaluating behavior models per character. Game implements this to integrate with its entity/component system.

remarks.para: The SDK provides IntentMerger and BehaviorEvaluatorBase, but the game is responsible for: - Managing which models are active per character - Providing the shared input state (game state) - Applying the MergedIntent to animations/physics - Calling EvaluateCharacter each frame

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.IBehaviorEvaluator.EvaluateCharacter(System.Guid,System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates all active behavior models for a character and returns the merged intent.
member.param: Current game state as input values.
member.returns: Merged intent from all active behavior models.

remarks.para: The sharedInputState contains values like: - Character health, stamina, position - Nearby enemy positions and states - Current equipped items - Environment conditions
All 4 model types (combat, movement, interaction, idle) are evaluated if active, then merged using urgency-based resolution.

member.summary: Invalidates a cached model when it needs to be reloaded.
member.param: The behavior model type to invalidate.

remarks.para: Call this when: - Character equips new weapon (combat model may change) - Character's class changes (all models may change) - Model is hot-reloaded during development

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.IBehaviorEvaluator.InvalidateAllModels(System.Guid)
member.summary: Invalidates all cached models for a character.
member.remarks: Call this when a character is respawned or their configuration changes significantly.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent
member.summary: Attention intent with blendable gaze targets.

remarks.para: Unlike simple exclusive channels, attention supports "blending" by providing multiple targets with weights. The game's animation system can then interpolate gaze direction between targets based on their weights.

Since entity IDs (Guids) cannot be mathematically blended, this struct provides primary and secondary targets with urgency-derived weights. The game resolves entity positions and performs actual gaze interpolation.
Example: Combat model wants to watch the threat (urgency 0.8), Movement model wants to look at the path ahead (urgency 0.4). Game blends gaze 67% toward threat, 33% toward path.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.PrimaryTarget
member.summary: Primary attention target entity (highest urgency contributor). Null if no attention targets.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.PrimaryUrgency
member.summary: Urgency of the primary attention target [0.0 - 1.0].

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.SecondaryTarget
member.summary: Secondary attention target entity (second-highest urgency contributor). Null if only one model contributed attention.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.SecondaryUrgency
member.summary: Urgency of the secondary attention target [0.0 - 1.0].

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.BlendWeight
member.summary: Blend weight for primary target [0.0 - 1.0]. The game should blend gaze: BlendWeight toward primary, (1-BlendWeight) toward secondary. If no secondary target, this will be 1.0.
member.remarks: Calculated as: PrimaryUrgency / (PrimaryUrgency + SecondaryUrgency)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.TotalUrgency
member.summary: Combined urgency for animation transition speed.

member.summary: Empty attention intent (not looking at anything specific).

member.summary: Whether this intent has a valid attention target.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput
member.summary: Structured output from a single behavior model evaluation. Extracted from raw output buffer based on IntentSlotLayout conventions.

remarks.para: Each behavior model (combat, movement, interaction, idle) produces one BehaviorOutput. The IntentMerger combines these into a single MergedIntent.

Output extraction uses the standardized slot layout: - Slots 0-1: Action intent + urgency - Slots 2-3: Locomotion intent + urgency - Slots 4-5: Attention target + urgency - Slots 6-7: Stance intent + urgency - Slots 8-9: Vocalization intent + urgency - Slots 10-12: Locomotion target Vector3 (optional) - Slot 13: Action target entity ID (optional) - Slot 14: Attention target entity ID (optional)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.ActionIntent

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.ActionUrgency
member.summary: Action channel urgency [0.0 - 1.0]. Higher urgency wins in conflict resolution.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.ActionTarget
member.summary: Target entity for the action (e.g., attack target, item to pick up). Null if action doesn't require a target.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.LocomotionIntent

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.LocomotionTarget

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.AttentionTarget

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.SDK.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.AttentionUrgency
